info.description:
General Atomics has finally put the finishing touches on their new model of Android, the Olympia, a robot with ultra-realistic skin feel and human-like thought speeds.

"Reaching from dykes and twinks to bimbos and Bears, we provide a wide range of body types and personalities in this model down to the lightest of freckles on their rear." the keynote speaker remarked putting his arms around a nude male and female units.

Scentless

Enjoy your purchase
